title: The Official Website of the Buffalo Bills
snippet: Kim Pegula is the owner of both the Buffalo Bills and Buffalo Sabres.

title: Buffalo Bills - Wikipedia
snippet: Drawing much of its fanbase from western New York and neighboring southern Ontario, the Bills are the only NFL team that plays home games in the state of New York. The franchise is owned by Terry Pegula, who purchased the Bills after the death of the original owner Ralph Wilson in 2014, and ...

title: Terry Pegula - Wikipedia
snippet: Terrence Michael Pegula (born March 27, 1951) is an American billionaire businessman and petroleum engineer. He is the owner of the Buffalo Sabres of the National Hockey League (NHL) and, with a consortium of private equity firms and athletes, the Buffalo Bills of the National Football League (NFL).

title: All About Jessica Pegula's Billionaire Parents, Buffalo Bills Owners Terry and Kim Pegula
snippet: Terry, who has two children from his first marriage, and Kim met at a restaurant in 1991 and married two years later. For the majority of their three-decade-long relationship, theyâ€™ve worked together and are the current owners of the Buffalo Bills NFL team and the Buffalo Sabres NHL team.
